20101231030202.000|20101231030203.000|CC1|THOUGH NEVER BETWEEN INMATES AND

20101231030214.000|20101231030217.000|CC1|100 MILES AWAY.                 
20101231030217.000|20101231030219.000|CC1|>> THREE GUARDS AND TWO INMATES 
20101231030219.000|20101231030221.000|CC1|WERE TAKEN TO AREA HOSPITALS    
20101231030221.000|20101231030222.000|CC1|THIS AFTERNOON AFTER A STABBING 
20101231030222.000|20101231030225.000|CC1|IN THE MAXIMUM SECURITY AREA.   
20101231030225.000|20101231030228.000|CC1|TWO USED HOMEMADE WEAPONS TO    
20101231030228.000|20101231030230.000|CC1|STAB TWO SERGEANTS AND A        
20101231030230.000|20101231030230.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL OFFICER AROUND 1:00
20101231030230.000|20101231030237.000|CC1|THIS AFTERNOON.                 
20101231030237.000|20101231030239.000|CC1|>> IT'S SIGNIFICANT ENOUGH WE   
20101231030239.000|20101231030242.000|CC1|LOCKED DOWN THE WHOLE SYSTEM.   
20101231030242.000|20101231030245.000|CC1|IT HAD TO DO WITH GANGS.        
20101231030245.000|20101231030246.000|CC1|IN THIS PARTICULAR CASE, THE    
20101231030246.000|20101231030248.000|CC1|ATTACKS SEEMED UNPROVOKED.      
20101231030248.000|20101231030249.000|CC1|SO THAT GAVE US CAUSE TO WONDER 
20101231030249.000|20101231030255.000|CC1|HOW WIDESPREAD THIS MIGHT BE.   
20101231030255.000|20101231030258.000|CC1|STAFF BEING ASSAULTED IS        
20101231030258.000|20101231030259.000|CC1|EXTREMELY SERIOUS.              
20101231030259.000|20101231030300.000|CC1|WE NEED TO MAKE ALL PRECAUTIONS

20101231030307.000|20101231030309.000|CC1|DOWN THE SOUTHERNERS PENDING THE
20101231030309.000|20101231030311.000|CC1|OUTCOME OF AN INVESTIGATION.    
20101231030311.000|20101231030312.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO LIMIT THEIR

20101231030314.000|20101231030315.000|CC1|WHILE WE'RE INVESTIGATING THE

20101231030316.000|20101231030317.000|CC1|WHAT WE WANT TO MAKE SURE IS

20101231030326.000|20101231030327.000|CC1|TRY TO FIND OUT EVERYTHING WE

20101231030543.000|20101231030544.000|CC1|IS I'M LOOKING FOR ANYTHING OUT

20101231030552.000|20101231030555.000|CC1|THE WHITE.                      
20101231030555.000|20101231030558.000|CC1|TELLS ME THERE'S SOMETHING GOING
20101231030558.000|20101231030600.000|CC1|ON, THERE'S A TRANSACTION GOING 
20101231030600.000|20101231030601.000|CC1|ON.

20101231030604.000|20101231030607.000|CC1|TRANSACTION OR MAYBE A POSSIBLE 
20101231030607.000|20101231030610.000|CC1|HIT ON AN INMATE OR STAFF.

20101231030612.000|20101231030614.000|CC1|DRAWS YOUR ATTENTION TO A

20101231030628.000|20101231030629.000|CC1|ON YOUR RADIO AND PUT THE YARD  
20101231030629.000|20101231030630.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20101231030630.000|20101231030630.000|CC1|IT'S ALWAYS BEST TO PUT THE YARD
20101231030630.000|20101231030633.000|CC1|DOWN AND INVESTIGATE IT AS      
20101231030633.000|20101231030634.000|CC1|OPPOSED TO LET IT GO.           
20101231030634.000|20101231030637.000|CC1|NEVER, NEVER EVER SHOW          
20101231030637.000|20101231030640.000|CC1|DISRESPECT, YOU KNOW, BY        
20101231030640.000|20101231030643.000|CC1|DISRESPECTING THE INMATE'S RACE 
20101231030643.000|20101231030645.000|CC1|OR HIS FAMILY.                  
20101231030645.000|20101231030648.000|CC1|IF YOU GOT TO PAT AN INMATE

20101231030650.000|20101231030653.000|CC1|AFTER YOU'VE BEEN HERE FOR A

20101231030653.000|20101231030654.000|CC1|SENSES THAT YOU DIDN'T KNOW YOU 
20101231030654.000|20101231030657.000|CC1|HAD.

20101231030658.000|20101231030659.000|CC1|IS GOING TO HAPPEN.

20101231030659.000|20101231030700.000|CC1|THERE'S TENSION.                
20101231030700.000|20101231030701.000|CC1|YOU KNOW IT'S GOING TO HAPPEN.

20101231030705.000|20101231030712.000|CC1|>> EVER SINCE THE INCIDENT AT   
20101231030712.000|20101231030720.000|CC1|TEHACHAPI THEY'VE BEEN LOOKING

20101231030725.000|20101231030729.000|CC1|CORCORAN.

20101231030733.000|20101231030735.000|CC1|MURDER THAT JUST TOOK PLACE.

20101231030747.000|20101231030748.000|CC1|EVERYONE HAS SEEN THE NEWS AND

20101231030815.000|20101231030815.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT.                   
20101231030815.000|20101231030817.000|CC1|SO WE KNOW OUR TARGET CELL,     
20101231030817.000|20101231030817.000|CC1|RIGHT?                          
20101231030817.000|20101231030818.000|CC1|ONE OR TWO?                     
20101231030818.000|20101231030819.000|CC1|WE HAVE TWO INMATES IN THERE.   
20101231030819.000|20101231030819.000|CC1|LOCKED DOWN INMATES.

20101231030825.000|20101231030825.000|CC1|TACTICAL CELL SEARCH.

20101231030833.000|20101231030833.000|CC1|OKAY.

20101231030841.000|20101231030843.000|CC1|IT'S GOING TO BE THE SECOND CELL
20101231030843.000|20101231030845.000|CC1|DOOR IN.                        
20101231030845.000|20101231030848.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO GO RUSHING INTO  
20101231030848.000|20101231030851.000|CC1|THE DOOR.                       
20101231030851.000|20101231030853.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO POP THE DOOR.    
20101231030853.000|20101231030857.000|CC1|SOMETIMES THESE GUYS FIGHT WITH 
20101231030857.000|20101231030859.000|CC1|US.

20101231030902.000|20101231030903.000|CC1|ORDERS.                         
20101231030903.000|20101231030904.000|CC1|THERE'S A CHANCE THERE COULD BE 
20101231030904.000|20101231030905.000|CC1|CHEMICAL AGENTS OR USE OF FORCE.
20101231030905.000|20101231030907.000|CC1|LIKE, THIS IS AN UNEXPECTED TYPE
20101231030907.000|20101231030914.000|CC1|OF CELL SEARCH.                 
20101231030914.000|20101231030914.000|CC1|THEY DON'T KNOW WE'RE COMING.
